Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class DamageTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.DamageTrack
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrenzyDamageTrack, NormalDamageTrack
    public abstract class DamageTrack
extends java.lang.Object
    Is (part of) the of each player, it contains the damages and marks received. This abstract class is extended by the two kind of board one can have: the normal one and the frenzy one. Different extensions differ by the way they deal reset and point calculation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int biggerScore
      the bigger score a damage-giver could ever acquire damaging a player with this damage track
      private java.util.List<Player> damageList
      Ordered list of damages.
      private int firstBlood
      points given to the first damage-giver
      private java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> markMap
      the mark count of the player
      private boolean markToDamages
      when true mark can become damages, otherwise not.
      private int skullsNumber
      the number of skulls on the damage track

      • damageList

      • markMap

        private java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> markMap
        the mark count of the player

      • markToDamages

        private boolean markToDamages
        when true mark can become damages, otherwise not. It is used as a support variable for correct damaging.

      • skullsNumber

        private int skullsNumber
        the number of skulls on the damage track

      • biggerScore

        the bigger score a damage-giver could ever acquire damaging a player with this damage track
